channel.title: [no anti leach]75% pking server! 474 moonscape! 150+ downloads 700+veiws!
channel.description:
[b][i][u][font=andale mono][size=36pt]NO ANTI LEACH MAKE A FUCKING FAMOUS SERVER WITH THIS AND DONT GIVE ME CREDITS IDFC![/size][/font][/u][/i][/b]
MoonScape v2 is a 474 server 75% dedicated to pking.
the client is LD, but it does work with HD if you can find the client
note: this client does not work with hamachi, which is why i'm releasing it.
The download has both client and server in it
http://www.mediafire.com/?a6v2chg44vmcue9
For the smarty who said they don't join servers without sights, here my sight, My server is a v1 thts 317. [url=http://moonscapeplay.webs.com/]http://moonscapeplay.webs.com/[/url]
[u]Features[/u]
-KBD ~ 100% -Pest Control ~ 75% -Fight pits ~ 50% -Skillcapes ~ 99% thanks to Massacred (no hitpoints, but added Quest-cape) -Barrel-chest stance and attack ~ 100% -Gs stance ~ 100% -Gs Attack and Block ~ 90% -good graphics -Knives ~ 100% -Pk points ~ 100% -Npc points ~ 95% -Donator ~ 100% -Killer Starter bank (100% Massacred)
[URL=http://img101.imageshack.us/i/barrelchestj.png/][IMG]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/3842/barrelchestj.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img576.imageshack.us/i/fightpits.png/][IMG]http://img576.imageshack.us/img576/5339/fightpits.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img22.imageshack.us/i/kbdp.png/][IMG]http://img22.imageshack.us/img22/4557/kbdp.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img801.imageshack.us/i/knives.png/][IMG]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/905/knives.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img42.imageshack.us/i/minigamest.png/][IMG]http://img42.imageshack.us/img42/9043/minigamest.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img202.imageshack.us/i/skillcapes.png/][IMG]http://img202.imageshack.us/img202/2500/skillcapes.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img828.imageshack.us/i/spec.png/][IMG]http://img828.imageshack.us/img828/5216/spec.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img815.imageshack.us/i/trainingarea.png/][IMG]http://img815.imageshack.us/img815/6715/trainingarea.png[/img][/URL]
